tidbits.title: Pristine Beaches
tidbits.description: Anguilla is renowned for its stunning, powdery white-sand beaches and crystal-clear turquoise waters, attracting visitors seeking a serene tropical paradise.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Anguillan cuisine is a delightful blend of Caribbean flavors, featuring fresh seafood dishes like crayfish, grilled lobster, and inventive culinary fusions.

tidbits.title: Musical Heritage
tidbits.description: Music is at the heart of Anguilla's culture, with vibrant local festivals celebrating calypso, reggae, and soca music, showcasing the island's rich musical heritage.
